markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=1561) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 100 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can extend one of your spells with a quick burst of laughter. You learn the [_cackle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=792) hex. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Cackle
